title: Nightlife
brief_description: Robin Lehman explores the wonders of the cold seas of Ireland. Shows the many creatures and plants, including scallops, sea anemone, fan worm and jellyfish. This fantastic drama captures some of nature’s most amazing and improbable creations. Without words but accompanied by music and sound effects.
